column4: I have an old DELL with Windows2000 on it and I want to add Ubuntu.  But it is so old that it doesn't boot from a CD.  Before I drag it out of the closet, is this doable?
uh did you check if the boot order was correct so that it was configured to boot the cd?
unless you mean the computer don't have the power for a livecd.
i would still chec- what Loki2010 said.
